name: Camping Hammock with Mosquito Net and Ridge Rope, Extra Large for 2 Person, Lightweight Hanging Hammocks Tree Straps, All-in-one Fast Open Hammock for Outside, Hiking, and Travel
short_description: 【Upgraded Comfort】This spacious hammock expands to a generous 114" x 55", boasting an oval-shaped design that lets you lie diagonally for enhanced comfort. The convenient floating storage pocket allows for easy access to your essentials. This versatile rope also acts as a handrail for children and is perfect for hanging lightweight items like lamps, enhancing your outdoor experience. Enjoy safety and functionality in one!

【Instant Mosquito Protection】Stay comfortable outdoors with our hammock's built-in mosquito net, which ensures optimal ventilation while keeping pesky bugs at bay. The dense mesh stops even the smallest mosquitoes, and you can easily unzip it for a roomy double hammock experience.

【Lightweight & Breathable】Weighing just 1.8 lbs and packing down to a compact size of 6.3" x 8.2", this portable hammock is crafted from 70D ripstop nylon for breathability, strength, and ultra-lightness. The included storage bag makes it easy to pack and carry wherever you go.

【Easy Setup & Complete Kit】Our camping hammock comes with everything you need for a quick and hassle-free setup: 2 elastic ropes (2 meters each, pre-tied for convenience), 2 aluminum tent stakes, 2 carabiners, 2 adjustable tree straps, and a built-in storage bag. Enjoy a straightforward setup that saves you time and effort compared to traditional hammocks.
